name: invisible-text-detector
title: Invisible Text Detector
description: Remove all hidden Unicode characters in your text, usually injected by LLMs.
author: garrett

commands.name: open-invisible-text-detector
commands.title: Open Invisible Text Detector
commands.description: Analyze, reveal and clean invisible / Unicode characters.

commands.name: fix-invisible-characters
commands.title: Fix Invisible Characters
commands.description: Removes invisible characters from input text.

commands.name: analyze-clipboard-invisible-characters
commands.title: Analyze Clipboard for Invisible Characters
commands.description: Show a quick summary of invisible / Unicode characters in the clipboard or selected text.

preferences.name: defaultCleanMode
preferences.title: Default Clean Mode (Quick Commands)
preferences.description: Which cleaning strategy to use for the one-shot, no-view command by default.

preferences.name: preferSelectedText
preferences.title: Prefer Selected Text over Clipboard
preferences.description: If enabled, commands try to use the current selection first, then fall back to the clipboard.
preferences.label: Use selected text when available

preferences.name: actionAfterClean
preferences.title: After Clean (Quick Commands)
preferences.description: What to do with the cleaned text when using a no-view command.

preferences.name: showToasts
preferences.title: Show Summary Toasts
preferences.description: Show a toast with a short summary after running commands.
preferences.label: Show toast summaries

preferences.name: replaceNBSPWithSpace
preferences.title: Replace NBSP with Space (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Replace non-breaking spaces with regular spaces when normalizing all Unicode.
preferences.label: NBSP → Space

preferences.name: convertSmartQuotes
preferences.title: Convert Smart Quotes (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Convert curly quotes to straight ASCII quotes when normalizing all Unicode.
preferences.label: Curly quotes → Straight quotes

preferences.name: convertDashes
preferences.title: Convert En/Em Dashes (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Convert en/em dashes to a regular ASCII hyphen when normalizing all Unicode.

preferences.name: replaceEllipsis
preferences.title: Replace Ellipsis with ... (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Replace the ellipsis character with three ASCII dots when normalizing all Unicode.

preferences.name: tabWidth
preferences.title: Tab Width for Replacement (All Unicode)
preferences.description: How many spaces to use when replacing tabs during normalization.

preferences.name: collapseMultipleSpaces
preferences.title: Collapse Multiple Spaces (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Reduce repeated spaces to a single space after normalization.
preferences.label: Collapse repeated spaces

preferences.name: normalizeNFKD
preferences.title: Normalize NFKD & Remove Combining Marks (All Unicode)
preferences.description: Use NFKD normalization and strip combining marks when normalizing.
preferences.label: NFKD normalize & strip marks

preferences.name: previewShowSpaces
preferences.title: UI Preview: Show Spaces
preferences.description: Display visual markers for spaces, tabs, and NBSP in the preview.
preferences.label: Reveal spaces

preferences.name: previewShowNonKeyboard
preferences.title: UI Preview: Show Non-Keyboard Unicode
preferences.description: Highlight visible but non-keyboard characters (smart quotes, dashes, ellipsis) in the preview.
preferences.label: Reveal non-keyboard characters

preferences.name: previewShowUnicodeTags
preferences.title: UI Preview: Show [U+XXXX] Tags
preferences.description: Append [U+XXXX] code point tags after non-ASCII characters in the preview.
preferences.label: Show [U+XXXX] tags

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
